text.section: There is a Baltimore Convention Financing Fund.

section.section: The Baltimore Convention Fund is a continuing, nonlapsing fund that shall be available in perpetuity to implement this subtitle concerning Baltimore Convention facilities.

The Authority shall:
use the Baltimore Convention Fund as a revolving fund for carrying out this subtitle concerning Baltimore Convention facilities; and
pay any and all expenses from the Baltimore Convention Fund that are incurred by the Authority related to the Baltimore Convention facility.

To the extent considered appropriate by the Authority, the receipts of the Baltimore Convention Fund shall be pledged to and charged with the following relating to the Baltimore Convention facility:
the payment of debt service on Authority bonds;
all reasonable charges and expenses related to Authority borrowing; and
the management of Authority obligations.
The pledge shall be effective as provided in § 10-634 of this subtitle and any applicable Authority resolution.
The Treasurer shall invest the money of the Baltimore Convention Fund in the same manner as other State funds.
Any investment earnings shall be credited to the Baltimore Convention Fund.
No part of the Baltimore Convention Fund may revert or be credited to the General Fund or any special fund of the State.
